title: Tokyo - Last Day
content:
Our final day was just revisiting some shops to look for souvenirs before we headed for the airport. Lots of delays because of snow from yesterday, so buses were slow, trains delayed and ours to the airport got cancelled - we had to catch the next one and just made it in time!

Has been a full on 3 weeks, but heaps of fun was had, with many strange and unique things seen and experienced!
